**Trailblazer A.K.A "The Galactic Batter"**

Awakened during the opening events of the game by [Kafka](https://honkai-star-rail.fandom.com/wiki/Kafka "Kafka") and [Silver Wolf](https://honkai-star-rail.fandom.com/wiki/Silver_Wolf "Silver Wolf"), they are found by [March 7th](https://honkai-star-rail.fandom.com/wiki/March_7th "March 7th") and [Dan Heng](https://honkai-star-rail.fandom.com/wiki/Dan_Heng "Dan Heng") on [Herta Space Station](https://honkai-star-rail.fandom.com/wiki/Herta_Space_Station "Herta Space Station") during the [Antimatter Legion](https://honkai-star-rail.fandom.com/wiki/Antimatter_Legion "Antimatter Legion")'s invasion.
